ygData.subject: Re: assasination question
ygData.messageBody:
<< I dont know about more than one Bayle list, but there is more than One
Bayle...Antonious's brother, Kane, who has allied with the bloodsabers.

this is almost sounding to be like a movie =)
>>

lol indeed... I know however the letter is in reference to Antonious as this
quest leads on from, as ive said assasinating the messenger from Qeynos. This
messenger is carrying a letter from Antonious warning the hall of truth that
their "spy" is in danger of being caught. The SK guy then gets pissed that
Antonious is working with the Hall of Truth. Perhaps i should use me cunning
and er, stolen Qeynos Guard shield to infiltrate the City of Qeynos and speak
to Anotinous myself =PP
